results.name: Trauma Rules | Compatible with MÖRK BORG

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @2.3 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.4 Ghz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
